name: Fourth Github Actions 

on: [push]

jobs:
  welcome-04:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout the Code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4  #<----- in the marketplace

      - name: Setup the Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.10'
          
      - name: Say Hello 
        run: echo "Hello, Welcome to to the Github Actions!!!"
        
      - name: Run Hello.py 
        run: python3 hello.py
